dublinCore.dc:title: HR 4939 ENR: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2551 Galena Avenue in Simi Valley, California, as the “Neil Havens Post Office”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.congress: One Hundred Thirteenth Congress of the United States of America
form.enrolled-dateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Friday, the third day of January, two thousand and fourteen
form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2551 Galena Avenue in Simi Valley, California, as the Neil Havens Post Office.

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2551 Galena Avenue in Simi Valley, California, shall be known and designated as the Neil Havens Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Neil Havens Post Office.

attestation-group.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
